author: Not available
source: The Complete Corpus of Anglo-Saxon Poetry

text.1: on his mode ðe bet,      þeah he micel age
text.2: goldes and gimma      and gooda gehwæs,
text.3: æhta unrim,      and him mon erigen scyle
text.5: ðeah ðes middangeard      and þis manna cyn
text.6: sy under sunnan      suð, west and east
text.8: Ne mot he þara hyrsta      hionane lædan
text.9: of ðisse worulde      wuhte þon mare,
